website_summaries.verdict: Although this roaster has a few design flaws, it performs exceptionally well for its very low price tag.
pros: Stands out for its durable nonstick surface, which holds up well over time and promotes effortless cleanup
cons: The pan itself lacks handles, making it rather difficult to pick up

customer_reviews.title: Not for broiler
customer_reviews.text: The pan came up when I searched for broiler pans. To my surprise, when I received it, the instructions said not to use it under a broiler. It also claims to be dishwasher safe, but not to use dishwasher detergent tablets or pods. If you want a broiler pan that you can’t use in the broiler and have to wash by hand, I guess this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The pan is good. I gave it four start because I do not know the durability of it.
customer_reviews.text: The roast pan works perfectly for me. Easy to clean and it fits in my toaster/oven. The size is perfect for cooking almost anything. I personally like to use aluminum foil on top for long-lasting, since I saw some reviews on how fast the pan gets damage. Like anything in life, if you like something and want it to last a long time, then you must take care of it. If you are buying this pan for a small toaster/oven, then you should use a measuring tape to check the size of the inside of the toaster, that is how I made sure it was going to be the right size for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these uncoated pans as opposed to the ones that are coated due to the longevity of it. This is a forever pan as long as you take care of it. The ones that are coated will eventually break down and can present health hazards. First off, uncoated aluminum does not overbake. You'll find that most restaurants use non coated ones due to this reason and in part because it's cheaper too. Anodized aluminum, non-stick, and dark metal conduct heat much more intensely so if you do end up purchasing that type of metal, you have to drop your oven temperature by 25°F to prevent over-baking. Sturdiness 5/5 ***** Value 5/5 ***** My Recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Gross. The edges are folded together, the top Edge is rolled, so water and food easily get in there but don't come out as easily. Until you go to wash the second time, and all of the dark Gunk comes pouring out... had to throw it out immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan almost every week since I bought it. I have been roasting veggies and baking in this pan. It is nice and deep so I can put a mix of veggies all at once!!! Roasting veggies tastes so much better than cooking them in a skillet or frying pan. Plus, it so easy: just chop, toss them into the pan, and bake. Since it is non-stick I don't use oil, unless I want a bit of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: NoeFromDC

customer_reviews.title: This fits perfectly in my Breville toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most optimal sized pan 13 x 9" that will fit in my Breville toaster oven! I plan to bake a Thanksgiving ham AND a small turkey and will likely use both the oven & my toaster oven = solution! I'll update this after using it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Completely rusted out
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product - pan completely rusted out . I have to line it with foil to even use it, but will be tossed out as soon as I get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherBee

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the non-stick claim, LINE WITH FOIL every time you use it
customer_reviews.text: I actually have two of these pans. One pan I semi-destroyed when I broiled my Sweet-Heat Bacon Wrapped Chicken Kabobs too close to the heating element. The burned-on bacon grease discolored/destroyed the non-stick coating on the pan, and made the entire pan very unsightly looking. (Note: Using the broiler seems to damage the pan more than regular baking temperatures.) So the second pan has gotten more careful handling. Now before every use I line the pan with aluminum foil to protect the pan and make cleanup easy. I've been using it about once a week for 4 months, and haven’t had any problems. So the secret to long life is... aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: TooManyHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this for all kinds of cooking so much we bought a second one to cook double batches of oven bacon. Sturdy, easy to clean and we love the handles on the removable rack. Just the right size to broil-crisp a chicken after coming out of the Instant Pot. Finished baked a couple of stakes last night and they came out great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: She is quite happy with them because they are well-made
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted these pans. She is quite happy with them because they are well-made, sturdy and should last a lifetime. She was looking for a pan without a non-stick coating since those always get scratched and then you have to toss them. We've purchased Chicago Metallic pans before and they have never been disappointed. Would buy again but since they'll probably last forever, I won't need to buy any more!
customer_reviews.author: hihawk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Roadting
customer_reviews.text: A favorite in this kitchen. We make a lot of baked dishes for dinner since I am pretty lazy. This keeps breaded chicken breast from dripping and making a mess. It makes it easier to put whole chickens and ducks on a pan without stick and cooking well since the slight gap with crisp the bottom and both sides will be even. It is super easy to clean. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Alanda Barash

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, moist delicious food.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pan, nonstick, food not sitting in grease. For meats I add just a little water in the pan to create enough steam for tender, moist and juicy texture with a tasty flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre Young

customer_reviews.title: Rusted the first time it was washed
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size and clean up is a cinch, but... The first time I used it, the pan rusted in the corners. The rust wiped off, but what I've discovered is happening is that water collects in the corner seams, rusts and then settles in the low spot of the pan. I've started popping it back in the warm oven after washing to ensure it is entirely dry, but this is a bit ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: 4 Corners Photo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baking pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pan! I been using two of them for 3 years, and just bought another one. Not only is it easy to clean and compact, it fits in a lot of tight places - like my Breville Convection Oven - because it doesn't have handles. I use it for all sorts of baking - lasagna, cakes, casseroles, roasted potatoes etc. And, I use it for roasting prime rib standing roasts. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ABQ Geek

customer_reviews.title: Bake and enjoy ! 🤗
customer_reviews.text: This baking pan is really good for baking biscuits and cookies and YES ! Chicken and potatoes too. Just wipe with soapy water and dry. I'm very satisfied with this order. 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Medina

customer_reviews.title: Surface is peeling off of the pan
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan 5/6 times. The bottom of the pan finish is peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: non-stick coating peels off
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment !! I have other Chicago products (cake pans, cookie sheets) that are wonderful. However, this pan is terrible. The so-called non-stick coating starting peeling off after 2 uses and the grill fell apart after 3 months. Absolutely, DO NOT BUY THIS PAN.
customer_reviews.author: FL_bluesky

customer_reviews.title: not stain proof...
customer_reviews.text: after a friend gave me a recipe for "oven fried chicken" i purchased this pan - just for that recipe! after the first use i noticed that the oil stains were quite fixed in the bottom and no matter how long i soaked it or rubbed at it with my washing sponge it didnt budge. by the second use- the stains had increased :( - making for a not so pleasant sight...but the non-stick quality was still there and the construction was quite sturdy too. so i wasnt completely disappointed then i came upon a recipe that recommended lining pans with foil when grilling so i have been doing that eversince :) so no additional stains have appeared
customer_reviews.author: Carlos De Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Quality and made in the USA!!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality roasting pan I have ever used. I use it almost every day and I have never, ever had to clean up a mess stuck to the bottom of this pan! Cooks evenly and worth every penny! I just purchased the jelly roll/cookie sheet set w/cooking/baking rack. I'll be swapping out most of my other cookware as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY CONSTUCTION- BUT BEWARE OF RUSTING & PEELING
customer_reviews.text: FOR ABOUT $10, I DECIDED TO BUY A REPLACEMENT FOR THE ONE THAT I BOUGHT ABOUT A YEAR AGO, MAYBE LESS. AFTER A YEAR AND MUCH USE FOR BAKING, AND DISHWASHER CLEANING, THE BOTTOM STARTED PEELING OFF. THIS WAS SUPPOSED TO HAVE A 25 YEAR WARRANTY, (RIGHT, BUT HOW TO GET IT?) BUT I DID NOT HAVE THE ORIGINAL WRAPPER TO RETURN IT TO CHICAGO METALLIC. THIS TIME, IT'S ALL ON FILE AND I WILL GO AFTER THE REPLACEMENT AT THE FIRST SIGN OF PEELING, WHICH I EXPECT TO HAPPEN AFTER SOME USE. THAT BEING SAID, THE SIZE IS GOOD AND THE RACK IS ALSO GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: SDBUYER

customer_reviews.title: Great for turkey
customer_reviews.text: Great for our Thanksgiving turkey. And then Gain for our Xmas ham. Was very easy to clean. And fit well in our stove with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little roasting pan that stores easy and gets the job done. I would not recommend this for cooking large (13 lbs +) turkeys as I personally like to add cut up veggies on the sides and the spacing on this (despite the rack giving some room from the bottom) isn't very manageable. Though, I really love the convenience of this as more of a regular use rack than a large turkey one. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Why the Complaints?
customer_reviews.text: Lots of people complaining the oven wrecked the non-stick, especially on the first use. Well here's a few uses and a dishwasher washed look later. Still looks brand new! Great product;
customer_reviews.author: Denny Goyette

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan
customer_reviews.text: love this pan -- I already have one that I have used for years. Bought this one for an extra pan. I will use the old one for meat, roasts, etc. and use the new one for desserts. Wish I could have order the pan WITHOUT the rack, because I really didn't need another rack.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy K

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I think I should have read the reviews before buying this pan. I loved the weight of this pan but after using it a few times the weight really doesn’t matter. The non stick coating is a joke it has started coming off in the corners and the rest of the pan has discoloration. I never use a dishwasher this has only been hand washed. Time to research a new roasting pan. 😟
customer_reviews.author: Britannia1

customer_reviews.title: Worked well.
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike, it left rust marks in my sink where the corners came in contact with the sink during washing.
customer_reviews.author: Johng45

customer_reviews.title: Does fit a 18 lbs turkey.
customer_reviews.text: It does fit my 18 lbs turkey and my turkey turns out really well. But I feel that I should have bought a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: yof

customer_reviews.title: Durable and high quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to make my thanksgiving turkey! It was a bit small for what j was looking for but it is great for my regular dinners! I use it all the time and it is extremely durable and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Keaton Hibshman

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan, but...........
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this pan, it had a good weight to it, nice rack. After 4 months the no stick finish started to come off in little round spots. Looks like it was not properly cleaned or dried before the non stick coating was applied. Not these spots are now rust spots in the pan. Wish there was a way to repair the rust spots. Too bad its no longer returnable/exchangeable. Guess I will need to use foil to keep the rust out of my food.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I just cooked our Thanksgiving turkey breast in this pan, and it cleaned up so great! No scrubbing, and also, I didn't spray anything on the pan before cooking. I wish I'd gotten this years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne E. Duer

customer_reviews.title: Always happy with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous loaf pans from this brand so I decided to get this one to add to my kitchen ware. It did not disappoint! Cooked slow baby back ribs with a ton of sauce. Thick bbq sauce and meat juices collected at bottom of the pan and I, being the lazy person I am, did not wash the dishes for a day (or two). When I did go to wash the pan, all food particles came off without any hesitation and only minor scrubbing. In all fairness, it was my fault it was stuck on there in the first place. I highly recommend anything Chicago brand, they make solid construction pans that will last you for many years.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I made the best stuffed mushrooms with this last week. Awesome quality pan. Easy to clean! I wish there was a little larger gap from the pan to the rack so I could roast potatoes and larger vegetables under, but it works fine for chopped veggies and drippings
customer_reviews.author: Capricaa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to clean this pan & rack....highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pan & rack. Says Non-Stick and it is!! Just used this for the 1st time tonight. Made cornish hens. I always dread the clean up after using any type of roasting pan & rack. Not anymore. This pan cleaned up so easily! This is the perfect size for 2 or 3 cornish hens or a large roasting chicken or a roast. I'm ordering some from friends as gifts. I'm sure they will like it as much as I do :)
customer_reviews.author: Amoi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The handle size is not the same as the one I bought in store (Same price). It’s not easy to hold and the handles are loosened.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Recommend--Should Have Looked Further & Spent More
customer_reviews.text: The grill rack does not really stick up out of the pan, so if you have anything that produces grease or oils that drain, your food will still be sitting in its own grease/oil, even on the rack. It also feels very cheap, and the rack doesn't fit too well inside of the pan, reducing the overall size available for cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Wife

customer_reviews.title: Achieve Roasted Delicious Goodness!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! I thought it was going to be slightly larger, but for all intents and purposes, this thing does that it needs to do. I wanted to roast meats in the oven and achieve browning results all the way around. The only way I could do this was by using this pan and rack so that my meats don't go swimming in their own juices. You can make a gravy with the leftover drippings in the same pan as soon as you take it out of the oven. I love this thing...want a roasting pan, get this one!
customer_reviews.author: ReviewGuru

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the square shape
customer_reviews.text: I use this set often for roasting . After the first wash the grate rusted badly , I no longer use the rack without covering it with foil .I don't like the square shape , its hard to clean the corners . With that said its a nice size and the rack has handles that make it nice to pull roast out of pan with . I haven't had any chipping or peeling of the coating so far , just the rusty (bad) rack
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. The rack fits perfectly and sturdily in the pan and I've used it many times that I hadn't considered using it for. Along with cooking a ham and roast, it bakes awesome chicken wings. Buy this and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of not paying attention to the size of the pan and ordered thinking this was a normal size roasting pan; needless to say when it showed up in a small box I was a little surprised. There's no getting a turkey in this pan at that rate not even sure a chicken could fit in the pan. The pan did seem to be good quality for the price but as I'm sending it back for larger pan I cannot attest to quality
customer_reviews.author: C. Gerrick

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, great size for cooking up food for 2-4 people
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this roast pan a couple of years ago and love it so much that I recently purchased another one, just in case this company decides to discontinue it. It's the perfect size for me and my husband to broil salmon in our oven. It's also the perfect size for our dishwasher. I've been washing it in our dishwasher every time for over 2 years and it's fine. Highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pan with rack.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. We used it on Thanksgiving and we couldn’t have been happier. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Condro

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: These pans are amazing. If you line them with aluminum foil, pan cleanup is a breeze. The racks are nicely coated to make cleanup far easier than it would be otherwise (Let's face it, any rack upon which you've been roasting meat, etc. is going to require some elbow grease to get clean.). These pans make cooking bacon in the oven so easy. Great for chicken drumsticks and wings too!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good kitchen utensil
customer_reviews.text: Well it certainly didn’t mess up the oven and it was easy to clean with proper aluminum foil underneath the rack.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Blakely

customer_reviews.title: This is an INCREDIBLE price for a wonderful pan & rack!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended!! Great size! Loving the non-stick. It cleans super easily and we have not had a bit of problem with any of the coating coming off or any rusting. The corners are very square so I use a brush to clean those. Love the rack that came with it and use that rack in other pans as well. I figured this would be a 'throw away" pan based on the price but it's used regularly and shows no sign of wear. It's a keeper!!
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Chick

customer_reviews.title: Stellar pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to replace some older cheap ones I had. I do a lot of baking and I have been using Chicago metallic bread pans (1 1.2 lb. size) and sheet pans for several years. these are as good as the bread and sheet pans and I have already used them many times with great results. I highly recommend these, and anything else Chicago metallic makes. They are stellar pans. Easy to clean, durable, heavy weight. I can't praise them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Jackman

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE ROASTING PAN, PURCHASING A SECOND!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pan continuously for roasting about a month now and nothing sticks to it! I put it in the dishwasher when I really don't need to and it washes we'll without it rusting as other reviews have stated on Amazon! I really bought it for my Breville Smart Oven Pro newest model and it fits perfectly. Purchasing another for my baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find a good roaster.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why is was so hard for me to find a good roaster for a great price, but I finally did. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this a lot. It's a convenient size and I love that the rack has a coating which makes it easier to clean. I prefer to line the pan with foil...and then clean up is very easy. Well constructed. Perfect for baking pieces of chicken and fish. Did burgers tonight. Also perfect. A very useful must-have.
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Mummert

customer_reviews.title: As expected, great quality from this manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: life long baker and never disappointed with this company....well made, easy to use, easy to clean, and amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much. It is of high quality. Very well made. Thick. Durable. But you need to take it with care, for it may burn or get sticky...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rack is great, the pan not so much
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the pan, it was smaller than it looks in the picture, however I do use the rack in a larger pan to cook bacon in the oven. The bacon cooks crisper and needs very little draining, I even use it to steam veggies in a pan covered with foil.
customer_reviews.author: GDWH

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting non stick pan.
customer_reviews.text: After having this pan for the last 2 and a half months it has lost it's non stick properties. I never use any spray oils as I know that's not good for non stick pans. But everything I cook on it literally gets stuck to the grate and the actual pan itself is discolored and everything sticks to it. Unfortunately I am unable to make an exchange as the time limit is up.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: great product and excellent service. Amazon delivery has improved greatly!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Downing Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectation!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful pan. I use it for baking hams and turkey breasts. Easy to use and easy to clean. I use a sheet of aluminum foil in the bottom to catch drippings. Handles on the rack make it easy to lift out of the pan. No sharp edges on the pan because it has rolled edges. I highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Orchid Lover

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this product but have noticed that after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Update to my prior review. The food sticks to the pan and it has become hard to clean. It's full of scratches now. Disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Soph

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality and Fit & Finish
customer_reviews.text: Great for baking proteins like chicken, steaks (reverse sear), etc. It has great build quality with solid feel and the rack is equally as impressive. It cleans well and is a nice size for a full chicken or 2 reasonable sized Rib-eyes or Strips. I'm interested in buying a larger one for larger birds, roasts and/or more steaks!
customer_reviews.author: Team V

customer_reviews.title: and it is very well loved. I use it at least once a week
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan for almost 2 years now, and it is very well loved. I use it at least once a week, if not more. It holds heat wonderfully, is the perfect size, and is very easy to clean. If things get baked onto it from high heat roasting, soaking it with water and soap normally works after a few hours, and then using a non-scratch sponge gets everything off. Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SamM

customer_reviews.title: Fits PERFECTLY in toaster oven or a larger oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of non-stick pans. Fits my toaster over perfectly!!! Looks exactly as advertised. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not a good pan for roasts + gravy making
customer_reviews.text: Bought this roasting pan about 11 months ago. Used it maybe 20 times at the most. Washed pan after each use, sometimes soaking for a couple of hours, with Palmolive, for spots that had baked on food. Did not want to scrub. Non stick surface is now peeling off in small pieces all over bottom of the pan. Will have to throw out as no longer will be able to make gravy with flecks of non stick surface peeling off. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Sussex

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have the usual 2 piece large broiling pan that you can never quite get completely clean. After a while it gets ugly looking and it is also much bigger than necessary for just 2 people. This is perfect. Easy to clean, heavy duty rolled edge to keep pan from warping when heated. Try has lift out handles. They seem to have though of everything. Will have to wait and see about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Alton D. Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This roasting pan is just perfect. I have used it twice a week since purchasing and can safely say I haven't encountered any discoloration which is great. The non-stick aspect is perfect too b/c unlike other non-stick racks this one actually works! I have left this thing soaking in water for a day or more and from there you can rinse it clean if you wanted. It also has survived the dishwasher a few times. This is one of those rare products where I say I have absolutely no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!
customer_reviews.text: I love this items. Non-stick pan. If I need another one, I will buy this item again. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental pan
customer_reviews.text: Pan is not easy to clean which causes the metallic to wear off. The company says if the metallic comes off the pan is ruined. I threw the pan away after 2 uses. I baked cakes. Before baking the buttered and floured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND...BAD COATING ON PAN
customer_reviews.text: The non stick coating on the pan began flaking off only after 3 uses. I used Ajax dish liquid, did NOT put in dishwasher and used soft sponge to clean. Love the rack but hate the pan...threw it away...never buy this product again and ABSOLUTELY DO NOT RECOMMEND...
customer_reviews.author: STACY

customer_reviews.title: perfect all purpose pan
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan, it is just the right size to bake three or four chicken breasts or four jumbo hamburgers. It is large enough to put two pork tenderloins on also. It cleans up wonderful so it is the pan of choice in our kitchen. We have used this pan for several months and it still cleans up perfectly, no signs of rust or any other aging, yup, I sm a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: works well , nothing special
customer_reviews.text: for backing certain sweets non stick is nice to have , i wouldn't use it for high heat or extended cooking of roasted meats not being a fan of non stick byproducts under those conditions . so far the surface has held up well, released all items from it with minimal fuss . it's just not a very heavy duty pan so it doesn't get 5 stars . affordable effective consumer grade item.
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Rack Rusted on First Dishwasher Wash
customer_reviews.text: The packaging says it is dishwasher safe, but when I put it in the dishwasher for a normal cycle, it came out with heavy rust on the rack at the part where the handles hinge with the wire grill. The non-stick feels good and I'll use it, but I can't say I'm happy with this early rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Old Neb

customer_reviews.title: As avertised.  I have bought this for family members.
customer_reviews.text: This is is great for breaded, seasoned or encrusted foods. You don't have to flip the food and the seasoning stay where they should (on the food - not the pan). I also used it for cooking chicken and other roasts. The fat drips into the bottom and stays off the food. If I reheat meat in the oven, I think it heats move evenly when I use this rack and pan. Clean up is so very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Ragone

customer_reviews.title: quality bake n broil pan
customer_reviews.text: replacement baking pan, this one has a removable non-stick rack as an extra. you can fold the handles in to get a little more lift to keep foods out of liquids. so far no marks on the pan. it appears to be well constructed there are folds in the corners.that I was worried about food getting stuck in but this does not appear to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: smtireman

customer_reviews.title: Just right for a 5 pound pork loin or the same weight in split chicken breasts.
customer_reviews.text: At this price, you don't need to look further for a good rack and pan. The rack is especially good and the main reason I bought this. The pan is relatively light but does its job and the non-stick coating works well, just let it soak a while.
customer_reviews.author: DukeofURL

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement pan for my old roaster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a heavier roasting pan. It takes up less storage space and less oven space. The non-stick coating doesn't even require the use of spray coatings like Pam. As a matter of fact, DON'T use sprays like Pam on this pan. If you do, you will spend considerable time cleaning it and your pan will be stained.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It's heavy duty for the price you pay. Its nonstick and easily cleaned. I used the roasting rack to make meatballs so the grease could drip from it and it worked perfectly. Exactly what I was looking for. I plan to use this pan without the roasting rack for an easy to clean cake pan also... meatloaves, roast chicken/turkey, etc Love this pan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki TodorovichTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: This exactly what I wanted! It was delivered promptly ...
customer_reviews.text: This exactly what I wanted! It was delivered promptly and on-time. I showed it to my lady friend and she wants to borrow it to bake her meatballs and Italian sausages when she prepares a big Italian feast and since I'm always invited to dine, I told her she could borrow it any time! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for baking chicken or other foods that you want to drip freely without sticking to the rack. We've had this for years and it is holding up far better than expected. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pellacan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in our smoker
customer_reviews.text: We wanted pans that would fit inside of our smoker, hold up to repeated use, and keep food off of the bottom of the pan. So far, these pans earn 5 stars in all three areas. Especially love that the handles can tuck under the grate for storage.
customer_reviews.author: MFrances

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful and good size to cook meat on
customer_reviews.text: 10/5 stars, husband uses this almost every day to cook things. Extremely useful and good size to cook meat on.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pan.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy metal. We have a parrot so cannot use non-stick. I do not like non-stick anyway.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Pan, Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy and versatile pan. It can be used as a broiler pan, a roaster pan, lasagna pan, for brownies, etc. It is very heavy. We have not used it many times, but the times we have used it under the broiler, it has not warped. I highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: To be able to use in broiler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for broiling then when I received it n fine print it said you can’t use it for broiling really very disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Good size and great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this roaster and use it weekly! It's ideal for a large chicken or a batch or oven baked bacon. The pan is deep and sturdy. I've had several racks, but I love this one because it's easier to clean since there is more space between the metal bars. I like that it's small because it saves space and allows me to avoid pulling out the giant turkey roaster when all I want is a roast turkey breast. Surprisingly high quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the best, highest quality pans that I have had in years. I would HIGHLY recommend it! I bought it to make Marcy Jo's pork chops & it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila W

customer_reviews.title: Nice, high quality pan
customer_reviews.text: Nice, high quality pan. Has a good weight to it; not heavy just feels like very good quality. Cleans up easily. Not a tefalon type finish and if things really get baked on, needs to soak for awhile but still very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It is perfect for my needs in baking and washes up like a dream. I have been cooking for 60 years and I wish I had this wonderful pan in the beginning. thank you for this fantastic bake ware!
customer_reviews.author: Sky-Mike

customer_reviews.title: I Like This Pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pan because my wife burned the last pan to the point where I could not get it clean. This pan is a wonderful pan. The rack gives even all round cooking. It cooks well and very easy to clean. I like the fact that it can go in the dishwasher, even though I wash it by hand. Burned material cleaned off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Junkmailforedw

customer_reviews.title: This is a must buy
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific! Lover the pan, the quality and can't say enough about it. Sizing is good for medium size roasting.
customer_reviews.author: Home chef

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great warranty, works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid pan. Don't make the same mistake I did - I bough this to roast a turkey and didn't even notice that it's a 9x13. Clearly not the product's fault and simply my own lack of common sense, but a turkey will definitely not fit in this thing. For any other use though, very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than my old broiler pan and not of the type they used to include with a new stove. Still, I find it very useful. It cleans up very easily and although it came dented (With no damage to the packaging) It wasn't bad enough for me to return it and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Round LAke

customer_reviews.title: repeat good purchase
customer_reviews.text: A previous purchase of this item has been in use for some years with satisfaction. This item is expected to do as well for a prolonged period of time
customer_reviews.author: Michel Wugmeister

customer_reviews.title: Has Proven to be Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pan for a few months now and have used it quite a lot for cooking chicken wings, etc... and so far it has proven to be very durable, I do always line it with Parchment Paper but the grate is still non-stick after so many uses and every other grate I've used in the past became non-stick very quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far otherwise
customer_reviews.text: It is a little bit smaller than I wanted but that is my own fault for not reading the dimensions properly. Great product so far otherwise! Been making ribs with it so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pan. It's not flimsy at all. Heavy duty and it cleans up so easy. It was a great purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: phxsue747

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A FIND!!! FINALLY!!! A roaster with A FLAT insert instead of a "V" insert! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Sugar6247

customer_reviews.title: Great roasting pan.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I use it all the time for roasting veggies and meats.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality........
customer_reviews.text: So sturdy, durable and easy to clean. I'm 62 so it'll be around long after I'm gone and I'll have to leave it to my grandkids. I'm sure the pan had nothing to do with me making my most delicious pork gravy ever but I'd like to think so. Great company, on time delivery too. Yum, what can I make next?
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Not a pan for a Turkey!
customer_reviews.text: The photo shown is inaccurate. The pan is small, even a 13lbs turkey barely fit. The sides didn’t cook because the pan was so snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It cleans easier. It is sturdier than other pans. It is the right size for turkey breast or large whole chicken. Love using parchment paper for lining to catch all drippings. That makes it super easy to clean. I love it so much I sent my son the same. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: A hiker

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this item enough that I purchased a second. I will say that the first time I used it to make a London broil, the drippings burned onto the legs of the grill and parts of the grill work. I probably ruined the non-stick coating by using an abrasive scrubber to remove the burned on juices. I strongly recommend wrapping the pan and grill in heavy duty aluminum foil. It only takes a few minutes and the pan and grill will look like new. It's made of thick metal and does not warp.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen M. Adornato

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size for this pan to bake chicken and other ...
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for this pan to bake chicken and other things to get rid of extra grease. Everything clean great and will be used.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa32

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a nice pan to broil with, this is great, the rack fits low enough in the pan that you don't have to worry about things sliding off and high enough that you can put water or broth in the bottom and your meat doesn't lay in it, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ed209

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Easy !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Chicago Metallics. This is a great small roasting pan.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

product_meta.title: Chicago Metallic Professional Non-Stick Roast Pan with Non-Stick Rack, 13-Inch-by-9-Inch - ,Gray
product_meta.description:
Style:13-Inch-by-9, with RackYou’ll be ready to take on even the largest meat with this pan. Large stainless steel handles ensure easy maneuvering of the pan and handles on rack make for easy transportation from pan to cutting board. This pan’s wire rod reinforcement and folded corners enforce high-quality construction and ensures no warping or "popping" in your oven. Oven safe to 450°F / 232°C; not intended to be used under the broiler. Sharp-edged utensils and knives should not be used. 
At Chicago Metallic, we believe that serious baking requires serious bakeware. That’s why we’ve been crafting innovative equipment, for professionals and serious home bakers, for over 100 years. We’ve built a global reputation one kitchen at a time. People know our products are built for durability and can be depended on year after year. We’re proud to offer three distinct lines of premium bakeware plus stylish, innovative specialty bakeware and baking essentials. The Chicago Metallic Professional line of bakeware makes cooking and baking a delight. The non-stick surface easily releases each recipe and makes clean-up effortless. It’s the preferred choice of bakers who understand quality and design, but also want professional-grade durability.
feature_bullets: EVERYDAY ROASTING PAN: This roasting pan includes an non-stick roasting rack designed to rest at the ideal height within the roaster, keeping the food cooking out of oils and excess juices; perfect for roasting meats, poultry, fish and vegetables.
SUPERIOR HEAT CONDUCTION AND EVEN BAKING: This pan is made from heavy-weight aluminized steel for superior heat conduction and even baking.
NON-STICK COATING: This roasting pan set is silicone based and has a non-stick coating for ease of baking and clean up.
MEASURMENTS: Non-stick roast pan with non-stick rack measures 13 by 9 by 2-1/4-Inch and is heat safe up to 450 degrees F (232 degrees C).
DISHWASHER SAFE: This pan is dishwasher safe, however hand-washing is recommended to extend the product life.
